item.title: How i got this website up and running.
item.description: Hello, this post is an explanation of how I got this website up and running. If you are reading this, the chances are that it is hosted on GitHub Pages. While there are numerous web-hosting options available, I preferred GitHub Pages for this project because of my prior experience with it. Additionally, it enables me to publish posts efficiently as I only have to place a markdown file in the correct folder, and GitHub actions, in combination with Hugo, do the rest of the work.
